lead_paragraph: SCHNEIDER--Charles, 85, of Sarasota, FL, formerly of New York, passed away on July 7, 2016. He is survived by his wife, Sandra, son, Jeff Schneider and his wife Caroline, two grandchildren, Andrew and Marc Schneider. He will live forever in our hearts. Beloved husband, father and grandfather. Funeral services will be held on Sunday, July 10th at 12:00 noon at Toale Brothers Funeral Home, Colonial Chapel, 40 N. Orange Ave., Sarasota. In lieu of flowers, the family requests that donations in his memory be made to Tidewell Hospice, Sarasota. 1/3
